nodes.text: Hellenah was a location in the galaxy. Sometime before 21 BBY, the Dressellian smuggler Has Obitt delivered munitions to Hellenah, garnering a hefty profit. Prior to the rescue of Galen Erso, Galactic Republic Lieutenant Commander Orson Krennic recounted a series of jobs Obitt had undertaken, including the one to Hellenah.
